email.description: Enter your email address to sign up. Only SNU email addresses (@snu.ac.kr) are acceptable.

descriptions: An email has been sent for verification. Please check your mailbox.
It may take some time for the mail to arrive.

tokenFailure.description: Token is invalid or expired. Please check the following if you accessed through the sign-up email we've sent.
details: Token will expire in 24 hours after the email is sent.
Only the most recent token sent to your email is valid. It may take some time for the email to arrive in your inbox, so please wait.
You won't be able to receive email anymore if you request it repeatedly. In that case, please contact us at contact@bacchus.snucse.org using your SNU email address (@snu.ac.kr).

signUp.signUpDone: You've successfully signed up! Please sign in.

form.administrativeInfo: The information below is used by the administrative office for verification.

signedInForm.description: Please select your email to receive password change instructions.
emailSentDescription: An email has been sent. Please check your mailbox.
It may take some time for the mail to arrive.

email.description: Enter the email address associated with your account.

descriptions: If there is a user registered with the entered email, a guide email will be sent to that email.
It may take some time for the mail to arrive.

tokenFailure.description: Token is invalid or expired. Please check the following if you accessed through the password reset email we've sent.
details: Token will expire in 24 hours after the email is sent.
Only the most recent token sent to your email is valid. It may take some time for the email to arrive in your inbox, so please wait.
You won't be able to receive email anymore if you request it repeatedly. In that case, please contact us at contact@bacchus.snucse.org using your SNU email address (@snu.ac.kr).

oidc.consentEmpty: {} 앱이 이전에 접근 허가를 받은 정보에 다시 접근하려고 합니다.

scopes.offline_access: 유저와의 상호작용 없이 유저 정보에 접근

validity.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.

error.emailSnuOnly: Only SNU email addresses are acceptable.
error.emailNotAvailable: This email address is not available.
